short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that enables direct field insertion into Odoo versions 17 and earlier, compatible with both tree and form views.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Odoo experience with our powerful Chrome extension designed for seamless field insertion in Odoo versions 17 and earlier. This intuitive tool allows users to effortlessly add fields directly into both tree and form views, streamlining data entry and improving workflow efficiency. Whether youâ€™re customizing forms or organizing data, our extension provides a user-friendly interface that integrates smoothly with your Odoo environment. Boost productivity and tailor your Odoo experience to your needs with just a few clicks!


Please ensure that 2-factor authentication is disabled to use this extension.
